sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
tou=to au)to\ kai\ a)/piston ei)=nai/ moi dokei=, to\
a)polipou=san to\n a)/ndra e)qelh=sai barba/rw| kai\ ce/nw| sunekpleu=sai.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
qa/rrei tou/tou ge e(/neka. pai=de ga/r moi e)sto
 du/o kalw/, *(/imeros kai\ *)/erws, tou/tw soi paradw/sw h(gemo/ne th=s o(dou= genhsome/nw: kai\ o( me

*)/erws o(/los parelqw
 ei)s au)th
 a)nagka/sei th
 gunai=ka e)ra=n, o( d' *(/imeros au)tw=| soi perixuqei\s tou=q' o(/per e)sti/n, i(merto/n te qh/sei kai\ e)ra/smion.
kai\ au)th\ de\ sumparou=sa deh/somai kai\ tw=n *xari/twn a)kolouqei=n kai\ ou(/tws a(/pantes au)th
 a)napei/somen.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p:
o(/pws me
 tau=ta xwrh/sei, a)/dhlon, w)= *)afrodi/th: plh
 e)rw= ge h)/dh th=s *(ele/nhs kai\ ou)k oi)=d'
o(/pws kai\ o(ra=n au)th
 oi)/omai kai\ ple/w eu)qu\ th=s *(ella/dos kai\ th=| *spa/rth| e)pidhmw= kai\ e)pa/neimi e)/xwn th
 gunai=ka  kai\ a)/xqomai o(/ti mh\ tau=ta h)/dh pa/nta poiw=.

p.#text:
mh\ 'pro/teron e)rasqh=|s, w)= *pa/ri, pri
 e)me\ th
 promnh/strian kai\ numfagwgo
 a)mei/yasqai th=| kri/sei: pre/poi ga a)
 ka)me\ nikhfo/ron u(mi=n sumparei=nai kai\ e(orta/cein a(/ma kai\ tou\s ga/mous kai\
ta\ e)pini/kia. pa/nta ga e)/nesti/ soi  to
 e)/rwta,
to\ ka/llos, to
 ga/mon  toutoui\ tou= mh/lou
pri/asqai.
'.
de/doika mh/ mou a)melh/sh|s meta\ th\n kri/sin.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: bou/lei ou)=n e)pomo/somai;

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: mhdamw=s, a)ll' u(po/sxou pa/lin.

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p:
u(pisxnou=mai dh/ soi th
 *(ele/nhn paradw/sein gunai=ka, kai\ a)kolouqh/sein ge/ soi au)th
 kai\ a)fi/cesqai par' u(ma=s ei)s th
 *)/ilion: kai\ au)th\ pare/somai kai\ sumpra/cw ta\ pa/nta.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: kai\ to\n *)/erwta kai\ to\n *(/imeron kai\ ta\s *xa/ritas a)/ceis;

sp.speaker: *)afrodi/th
sp.p: qa/rrei, kai\ to\n *po/qon kai\ to\n *(ume/naion e)/ti pro\s tou/tois paralh/yomai.

sp.speaker: *pa/ris
sp.p: ou)kou=n e)pi\ tou/tois di/dwmi to\ mh=lon e)pi\ tou/tois la/mbane.
